text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: I exist solely to pursue that which I deem "beautiful". For that is both my "aesthetic" and "raison d'être"……!

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: Ergo, to show the world the beauty of this aesthetic, I will rain endless destruction upon the fences that confine us, no matter how uncountable and inexhaustible their number!

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: And I will bring order to the chaos of splintered remains by my own hand. Their restoration executed in unparalleled perfection ——

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: Heheh, the finesse with which I wield the hammer is beyond compare, you know? —— Are you eager to witness it?
